structure.unit: ARTICLE VII. CONTRACTING, PROCUREMENT BONDING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES ACTIVITIES

law.catch_line: Article's provisions; areas of application; additional to other laws.

text.section:
Sec. 11A-50. Article's provisions; areas of application; additional to other laws.
This article is applicable in both the incorporated and unincorporated areas of Miami-Dade County. All violations shall be prosecuted in the court of appropriate jurisdiction of Miami-Dade County, Florida.
The provisions of this article shall be cumulative and additional to and not in derogation of any and all other provisions or laws prohibiting discrimination in contracting, procurement, bonding or financial services activities.
